author: kkolinko
msg: - Add a note that this changelog file is obsolete.
- Add XSLT stylesheet reference so that the file is viewable in a web browser (such as Firefox).
- Fix a pair of markup errors.
It is backport of r1617576 from tomcat/trunk.

author: kkolinko
msg: Move jdbc-pool changes for 8.0.11 from modules/jdbc-pool/doc/changelog.xml into main webapps/docs/changelog.xml.
- Add a note that this changelog file is obsolete.
- Add XSLT stylesheet reference so that the file is viewable in a web browser (such as Firefox).
- Fix a pair of markup errors.
